## R Markdown
Setup: Load packages and .csv

```{r }
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(stringr)
library(viridis)

soil_props <- read.csv("cleaner_master_20211031.csv", header=T, na.strings=c("", " ", "NA"))
head(soil_props)
str(soil_props)
```

## Including Plots

Checking groups of data for cleanliness

```{r }
C2<- soil_props %>% filter(treatment == "C2")
view(C2)

C2.bd<- soil_props %>% 
  filter(treatment == "C2" & !is.na(bd))
view(C2.bd)

C2.bd.min <- soil_props %>% 
  filter(treatment == "C2" & !is.na(bd) & horizon != "O")
view(C2.bd.min)

```
